articles.title: Jack Grealish and Ross Barkley 'in Covid rule-breaking shame' - Daily Mail
articles.description: It is the second time Jack Grealish has landed himself in trouble for breaking coronavirus guidelines, after partying at an ex-team-mate's flat back in March and crashing his car.
articles.content:
Jack Grealish and Ross Barkley face stern questions after allegedly breaking their strict coronavirus rules by partying in London on Saturday.
